title: Warm pak choi salad with ginger and chilli dressing

default: 25g/1oz piece root ginger, peeled, finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Place the pak choi into a steamer and steam for five minutes, or until wilted.
Whisk the rest of the ingredients together in a small bowl to make a dressing.
To serve, pile the pak choi onto a serving plate and drizzle over the dressing.
